column4: Has anybody had any luck getting the extra buttons on a g15 logitech mouse to work?  I modified my xorg.conf to Option "buttons" "9" but it still only sees the first 5 (including mouse wheel up/down)
i think I have a g5 or a g7, but I only that I have around 5 buttons
no, I guess its 8 buttons on this mouse, including mouse wheel
I did use an .Xmodmap to remap the buttons, I dont know if that would help you
